snippet: The “rats215” account on the photo-sharing website Instagram has posted pictures, police statements and testimony identifying more than 30 witnesses since February.
abstract: Philadelphia Police Department says that investigators have learned of anonymous social media account that has been identifying witnesses to violent crimes across Philadelphia with stated intention of trying to 'expose rats'; 'rats215' account on photo-sharing Web site Instagram has posted pictures, police statements and testimony identifying more than 30 witnesses since February 2013.
lead_paragraph: The “rats215” account on the photo-sharing website Instagram has posted pictures, police statements and testimony identifying more than 30 witnesses since February.

headline.main: Philadelphia Police Find Online List of Witnesses
headline.print_headline: Philadelphia Police Find Site Identifying Witnesses
